descriptionHtml:
[font=Courier New][size=3][b]weapon scabbard hidden
for vanilla / vanilla USKPfix / dawnguard / dragonborn / dragonborn UDBPfix
[/b][/size]
[i]by gert129[/i]

First, sorry for poor english ...

[color=#ff7700][size=3][b]**Info[/b][/size][/color]
This mod modify weapon's scabbard, [u]to hide it[/u].
(in NifScope, I change the scabbard's flag, from 14 to 15, [u]not remove it[/u].)
I post file tree, you can see below.

[color=#ff7700][size=3][b]**Compatibility[/b][/size][/color]
This mod [u]not compatible[/u] other mod that change weapon nif file, likes
 Greatsword sheaths and scabbards [i]by DoubleBrewski
[/i]  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5624
 DSpSoB - Dual Sheath plus Shields on Back [i]by DarkPhoenix
[/i]  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17746
 
[b][color=#ff7700][size=3]**Installation[/size][/color][/b]
Copy file to "\\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data".
Remember,
if you want to install "weapon scabbard hideen - vanilla USKPfix",
you need "Unofficial Skyrim Patch v2.0.6",

if you want to install "weapon scabbard hideen - dlc01 dawnguard",
you need "Skyrim Dawnguard DLC",

if you want to install "weapon scabbard hideen - dlc02 dragonborn",
you need "Skyrim Dragonborn DLC",

if you want to install "weapon scabbard hideen - dlc02 dragonborn UDBPfix",
you need "Unofficial Dragonborn Patch v2.0.6",

if you want to install "weapon scabbard hideen - AllInOnePack", 
you need two DLC, USKP and UDBP.

[b][color=#ff7700][size=3]**Uninstall[/size][/color][/b]
Just delete file.

[color=#ff7700][b][size=3]**[/size][/b][size=3][b]Special Thanks[/b][/size][/color]
NifSkope  [u]http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope[/u]
BSAopt  [u]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/247[/u]
Unofficial Skyrim Patch  [u]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19[/u]
Unofficial Dragonborn Patch  [u]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31083[/u]

[b][color=#ff7700][size=3]**Version[/size][/color][/b]
[color=#6aa84f]v0.1[/color]
 Release.
[color=#6aa84f]v0.11[/color]
 Fix 3 files error:
[size=1]  meshes/weapons/dwarven/1stpersondwarvenhandaxe.nif
  meshes/weapons/iron/1stpersonironmace.nif
  meshes/weapons/orcish/1stpersonorcishmace.nif
[/size] Add a all in one pack.
[/font]
